replies.bodyText: Vanilla doesn't have support for that feature. I looked into it when I was making this, and MobEntity.getPreferredEquipmentSlot is used in so many places (armor stands, player menu, mobs...) that it'd be annoying to mixin to them all.
replies.author: Juuxel

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I hope they could've done it like determining the facing of an entity where they give a list of facing from closest to farthest. They could've done that as well.
